ygData.subject: Re: Greetings All!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well hmmmm.... I am Liani, SongWeaver of the 16th Measure, Guardian of Faydwer in the alternate reality that is named for Bristlebane.  I have been known to
ygData.messageBody:
Well hmmmm....

I am Liani, SongWeaver of the 16th Measure, Guardian of Faydwer in the
alternate reality that is named for Bristlebane. I have been known to solo
on occasion but most often can be found fighting with my sister Jyora, her
betrothed Tyldaryn and my own beloved Theodoric. The four of us have a
personal vendetta against all orcs and will pause to slay any that cross our
path. Whereever I am is my least favorite place to die at the hands of evil
and at the moment, we fight in the icy halls of Castle Permafrost. If I
recall correctly, the gods have been kind to me in that I have always had
good friends at my side to protect me as I retrieved my belongings and hence
have neer died in doing so. However I do not believe I have been so blessed
as to pass even a single measure of skill without paying for it with my life
at least once.

Personally I refer to the practice of playing several songs at once to gain
the benefits of all as Juggling. I personally have no use for a Dragoon
Dirk as the long sword and the axe are my weapons of choice, though my
beloved has one that he seems quite fond of.

I believe that is everything. Feel free to ask if I have missed any of your
questions.

Liani MystWeaver
-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 4:20 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Greetings All!


>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>Welcome~
>
>Good to meet you - we all wanna know:
>what level you are;
>do you party or solo;
>fav blue to kill;
>unfav place to die in;
>most number of deaths getting a corpse back;
>most number of levels with no death (if any :);
>
>please also submit a suggestion for the term to describe playing two songs
>at once (don't say 'twisting' <g>); run out and buy a Dragoon Dirk; and
tell
>us what in your 'bio' screen when ppl inspect your equipment. There now you
>are up date <bg>!!
>
>Seriously, Welcome!
>
>Sylly
>Bard of the 15th level
>a.k.a. Robo-Bard
>camped out somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>
>
